content.raw:
Interestingly, the test passed when I ran it, and the following messages appeared in test.log:

```
(1418765790 868810022) [Err] [Model.cc:780] Exception occured in the Load function of plugin with name[exception] and filename[libExceptionModelPluginLoad.so]. This plugin will not run.
(1418765790 869020449) Exception occured in the Load function of plugin with name[exception] and filename[libExceptionModelPluginLoad.so]. This plugin will not run.
(1418765790 945576349) [Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:142] ServerFixture load in 1.2 seconds, timeout after 600 seconds
(1418765791 48259293) [Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:93] ServerFixture::Unload
```

It probably works because the tested plugins are ModelPlugins, and the exception occurs in `Model.cc`, not in `gazebo.cc`.
